name: Shoreline Flood Explorer: Corte Madera
summary: Developed by Virtual Planet and the Town of Corte Madera, the Shoreline Flood Explorer: Corte Madera uses U.S. Geological Survey’s CoSMoS data to model flooding impacts under various storm surge and high tide scenarios. This Virtual Reality experience and online tool, featuring immersive storytelling, are part of the Town's Shoreline Adaptation Engagement Effort to share information about flood risk, enabling the community to take informed action.
